response:
"datenprivatsphäre? was ist das denn? 🤔 mehr und mehr firmen und regierungen sammeln unsere persönlichen daten. gibt es überhaupt noch ein recht auf informationelle selbstbestimmung? 🤷‍♂️ ich denke, wir müssen unsere daten schützen und nicht einfach so weitergeben. #datenprivatsphäre #informationelleselbstbestimmung"

translation:
"data privacy? what's that? 🤔 more and more companies and governments are collecting our personal data. is there really a right to informational self-determination? 🤷‍♂️ i think we need to protect our data and not just give it away. #dataprivacy #informationalselfdetermination"

this post critically examines the topic of data privacy, questioning whether there is still a right to informational self-determination in today's digital age. the author suggests that individuals need to take action to protect their personal information and not simply give it away without thought or care. the hashtags #datenprivatsphäre (data privacy) and #informationelleselbstbestimmung (informational self-determination) are used to reach a wider audience and encourage discussion on the topic.
